overview: Devyn Foster is the newest member of the Hunter Scott Boyfriend OF THE WEEK CLUB. Brandon West and Bruneaux have a laugh at Hunter's game and Devyn's predicament. Then Scott Russell comes into play. Or prey. Carl Radford is also in need of comfort and finds it in Hunter's roommate Randy Mixer. Oh, what a tangled web we weave, when the lies and the lays meet. Particularly Bedroom Lies, from Jim Steel and Rage.
tagline: From bedroom eyes to bedroom lies.
title: Bedroom Lies
